name: Fin Yang
description:
Enjoy the relaxing game and environment to try to get On and Myo to meet again.

On and Myo have been separated from each other in the pond but they continue to feel the movements of the other, itching to find each other so their love can continue and stretch across the universe forming a bond that will create peace and tranquility for the rest of the pond.

Even in different times, they continue to find the other and form as one. Their love cannot be separated, even if the universe continues to try to keep them apart.

Game Controls:

WASD or the Arrow keys to move the platform and move Myo and On.

Use the rock walls as a support to guide one fish towards the other. Once the two have reconnected, you will progress to the next level.

 

Team:

Fin Yang was created by all of us as a group at Webster University for the 2022 Global Game Jam. The concept was developed and expanded as a group and we are all very happy to share this project with you!

Thomas Kinney – Art/3D Modelling/

Dorian Green- Coding/Level Design

Patricia Teal - 3D Modelling/Animation

Vinny Peters- 3D Modelling/Art

Katie Stickler - 3D/Modelling/Art

Jordan Wadell– 3D Modelling/Art

Shelby Lodewyks – Level Design/Audio Design/Narrative Design

Matthew Burton – Professor/Coding

Install Instructions:

1-Un-Zip the file

2-Launch “Game File”

3-Enjoy
